channel.title: Another problem - Help please

Looking for help.
Wonder if anyone knows how to fix this, it'd be great if you did :) :)

item.title: Another problem - Help please

} public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if (amount > 0) { if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0) { if (!takeAsNote) { if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) { if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) { bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); } } else {
